name: Your Bedroom
longDesc:
You are in your bedroom.
There is an exit to the upstairs hallway.
There is a bed against the wall. You store your treasures underneath it.
There is a bedside table with a lamp next next to the head of your bed.
Your closet is on the wall.
It has a chute that leads to the basement where the laundry room is.
There are dirty socks on the floor of your closet.
description:
This is your bedroom.
There is an exit to the upstairs hallway.
Your closet has a chute that leads to the basement.

closet.name: closet
closet.description: The closet is full of toys.  At the back of the closet is a laundry chute leading to the basement.

under the bed.name: under the bed
under the bed.description: Under the bed is dark and smelly, but there are no monsters...you think.
under the bed.discoveryStatement: That's where the dog whistle went! You see it against the wall under the bed.

dog whistle.name: dog whistle
dog whistle.description: The dog whistle is small and silver. Use it to summon your mighty steed.

dirty socks.name: dirty socks
dirty socks.description: Your socks are all identical black crew cut socks that can be bought in ten packs at the store. These ones are stinky but also important.
